vendor_name: Hotel de la Poste - French Quarter, A Renaissance Hotel
title: Grand Opening: Boutique New Orleans Hideaway with Daily Breakfast & Daily US$30 Dining Credit
description:
Tucked within the storied streets of the iconic city's French Quarter, this refined retreat offers an intimate escape just moments from the bustle of Bourbon Street. Jewel-toned interiors, locally inspired artwork and design details that echo the city’s rich musical legacy come together to create a space that feels both timeless and unmistakably New Orleans.

Lounge poolside or maintain your wellness routine at the 24-hour onsite gym. When it’s time to dine, indulge in bold Creole flavours at 3rd Block Depot Kitchen + Bar, where tradition meets creativity. Step outside and find the city at your feet - wander along Royal Street’s galleries, sip cocktails beneath wrought-iron balconies, or let the drifting notes of live jazz from nearby clubs lead your way.
